mapper.select: select id, conType, conTitle, (conFirstPrice * conFirstPeople + conSecondPrice * conSecondPeople + conThirdPrice * conThirdPeople) as totalPrice, date_format(conEndDate, '%y.%m.%d') as conEndDate, (datediff(conEndDate, now())) as endDate, conCompanyName from contest_Upload where datediff(conEndDate, now()) >= 0 order by id desc
